iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Introduce wildcards in the final part of the rule to account for the variability in the `call` instruction. Specifically, the last `E8` byte should be replaced with a wildcard.

new_signature_details.name: stealth_timeout
new_signature_details.description: Possible date expiration check, exits too soon after checking local time
